website_summaries.verdict: As usual, Dyson produced a competent product that costs too much. At $600, the Absolute isn't worth the upgrade over the Linx or even over other Dyson sticks.
pros: The Dyson v6 Absolute vacuum cleaner improves on previous Dyson sticks with a soft roller cleaning head that ups its prowess on hardwood floors
cons: The new vacuum head is clever but imperfect
Pet hair sticks to it and it flings the large particles it fails to grab

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY A DYSON
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY A DYSON, this is my second dyson animal and the second one to just stop working. Huge waste of money. Bought this 7 months ago, just stopped working. The first one the motor simply quit and the second one the brush motor simply quit. I take care of my items always cleaning them and making sure there are no clogs, new filters. BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: K. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 6 months. Battery is the suspect, I am hoping dyson will help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall good vacuum, with a couple minor flaws.
customer_reviews.text: It is an extremely powerful vacuum. Vacuums deep into carpet. I have two cats and it fills quickly with thick cat hair. Negatively, the cup fills quickly, necessitating frequent cup empties. I have had no problems with battery life, but I only do a room at a time. I bought it at $470 , but several days later the price was dropped to $374. A bit of a rip off. I have a Dyson canister, but rarely have a need to use it. Another problem I see, is that hair wedges up into the narrow portion of the cup so I have to scoop the jammed material with a knife.
customer_reviews.author: manncer

customer_reviews.title: Throw your broom away!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vacuum I've ever used hands down. It's perfect for my home. I use it on wood laminate, tile, and area rugs. It's perfect for my dog's short hair, bits of shredded toys, and even leaves and small sticks. I haven't touched a broom since we bought it. This vacuum is a catch all! It barely even feels like a chore to use!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Renee

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you have pets or children.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy if you have children or pets. This vacuum is pretty useless in our house. It runs for 2 minutes then begins pulsating because it’s clogged. Every two minutes I have to stop vacuuming and clear the clog. I would say it’s just this particular vacuum that is defective, but it’s the second of this exact model I have tried. We have better luck using our shop vac. Really bummed we spent so much money on it as we don’t use it due to the frustration and ineffectiveness. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Braniff

customer_reviews.title: Replaced our upright
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough how well this stick vacuum works. Too bad it is being phased out. This picks up just was well as our Dyson (DC25) upright but weighs a fraction as much. Yes, you only have about 20 minutes before needing a recharge, but with no cord and the light weight you can fly through the vacuuming chore (and you'll likely do it more often). On carpeted stairs it beats anything else we've tried. It also works great for cleaning our cars.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lord

customer_reviews.title: Never thought we would be this happy over an expensive vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Never thought we would be this happy over an expensive vacuum, but this is light, strong and just that much better and makes cleaning easy. Although I thought the battery life would be too short, it works so well, so that I don't go back and forth in one spot, and really picks up stuff. I also like the idea that I have to clean fast before the battery dies. This thing just works!
customer_reviews.author: MobyS

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this vac!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a Dyson Cordless for a long time and finally couldn't wait any longer. I have a very bad back and both shoulders are a mess all thanks to 2 car accidents. I HATE the upright we have as it's so heavy and hard on me. I LOVE my Dyson. At first it seemed rather hard to push on carpet and I was concerned about that, but on my second use I figured out how best to push it and it's been great. Now I can keep my floor clean any time and not have to lug out the elephant upright. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: PhantomCat

customer_reviews.title: a great cordless vac
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a Dyson for my wife's mother and later decided to get one for ourselves. I have to admit to being a skeptic and not wanting to pay that much for the Dyson. I am, however, a believer now. The unit does everything advertised and we even use it on scatter rugs, although you have to be careful since it is so powerful. We have a lot of laminate flooring and it does a great job and does not scratch. We would recommend this unit. And as a side note, we believe this unit is good enough for pet hair without paying extra for the "animal" model. Just our opinion, but we do have one cat.
customer_reviews.author: Fred D.

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best for the price?
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is good, no doubt, but the price is a little steep for what you get considering it's a very old model at this point (they're up to V10 or 11). I had a DC34 before this which actually did not clog, whereas this one seems to catch hair in the fine filter holes around the top. It forces you to use a brush or your hand or something to clear that off after separating the bin entirely from the motor unit. The suction and tools are much better though, which is why I got it. Would also be nice if they provided mounting screws in the box for the wall mount.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: it’s amazing. The only issue I have is cleaning/removing debris
customer_reviews.text: It’s a Dyson...it’s amazing. The only issue I have is cleaning/removing debris. It’s hard to get the whole cylinder off the unit. You can pull the red latch and pull the debris out by hand but that’s messy...if you pull it again, the whole chamber is suppose to come off, but it’s a struggle and I almost feel I’m going to break it every time. Buy it knowing you’ll need to wash your hands after. Best vacuum I’ve owned even with this flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Zach

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as the hype
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a year and then the battery died. Yes, Dyson sent me a free replacement, but they made it clear this would be a one time deal. Now I ask you if the battery dies every year would you buy it? I'll let you know next year if it is still working. Also, a small point, but Dyson advertises how intelligent their design is yet the serial number is behind the filter and is impossible to read when the customer service representative asked for it. Still, they DID send me a free replacement battery however, 3 stars because I paid a premium because I thought I would have less problems than a Hoover or other cheaper brands.
customer_reviews.author: Zenster

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this vacuum and WOW it is amazing. My kids even WANT to vacuum their room ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a shark fanatic but I tried the Ion Flex and it clogged with my long hair immediately. I returned it because I couldn't get it clean and knew it would be a hassle every time I used it. I ordered this vacuum and WOW it is amazing. My kids even WANT to vacuum their room because it's so lightweight and easy to use and there is no cord to fight with. Best part? When the roller gets full of hair, I can easily pop out the entire roller and clean it. So simple, it makes you wonder why my vacuums don't have that ability.
customer_reviews.author: needwingstofly

customer_reviews.title: Low battery life, small canister
customer_reviews.text: This works well for light duty on stairs, quick cleanup on hardwood floors and light domestic carpet duty. Not suitable as a front line, full time vacuum. The price has come down on these since we got ours making them a somewhat better deal if you need a handy quick fixer-upper sort of tool. Make sure to keep yours clean and to clear the internal filter and passageways from time to time. Capacity limitations make emptying the canister more annoying than you'd think. That said, as a battery powered vacuum for light us it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Barrett

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I did a lot of thinking between buying this or the new one at the time, which was the 7. I would probably buy the cheapest one again next time. I don't think getting an extra 20 minutes on battery life is worth it. This thing is great. The only thing that I would want is for the roller to have a pile height adjustor and perhaps make it easier to empty. If they changed those things, might be worth spending more. But this is a must have and makes vacuuming less of a chore.
customer_reviews.author: cp_lin

customer_reviews.title: Four years and counting!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this vacuum for four years, 3 houses, and two states (east and west coast)! It is the best investment for keeping a home clean, especially if you have animals. We have two cats and this thing keeps our furniture and floors pretty free of pet hair. I love having a cordless vacuum - I clean much more regularly and get in all those nooks and crannies one misses with a large vacuum. The attachments are all great and you can even take off the tube and use it more like a dust buster to clean our your car and tight spaces.
customer_reviews.author: hubbyluv

customer_reviews.title: Another excellent product from Dyson!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Dyson vacuum cleaner and I absolutely love it. For starters, it's super light weight and doesn't come with the hassle of a cord, so it's easier to use than a traditional vacuum cleaner. But, even though it's small and light, it still does an excellent job of cleaning up, with strong suction. I had our electrician install an outlet in a broom closet, so this is always handy and charged. It is such an efficient machine -- doesn't scratch my newly re-finished hardwood floors, picks up things right along the baseboard, works well on tile, wood, carpet, cushions, etc. I absolutely love this vac and use it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: JSR

customer_reviews.title: VERY, VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to purchase this Dyson but what a bummer! I bought this vacuum through Amazon last year and it is now so frustrating and useless! The vacuum "runs" for 15 - 20 seconds then "cuts out". I try to use it immediately after charging but it is absolutely disappointing! At first it was just fine but I think for the money that I spent, it should work better for longer than a year. Never buying a Dyson again sadly! In the trash it goes!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Vacuum! We purchased on black Friday
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Vacuum! We purchased on black Friday, and have been using it daily ever since. My wife loves how light the unit is. It is so much easier to use than a conventional upright vacuum, especially when it comes to cleaning the stairs. This vacuum's suction is very strong and pulled more dirt out of our carpets than our old vacuum. It also performs great on our hardwood floors. Charge time is about 20 minutes, less on the max setting, but this hasn't been an issue. Rather than vacuum the entire house all at once, we find ourselves using this vacuum to clean a few rooms daily. Very impressed with the performance of this Vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: My favorite cleaning product/device
customer_reviews.text: Makes vacuuming much easier without having to fuss with plugging-in and unplugging a cord. Excellent suction power. Pretty easy to disassemble for deep cleaning (I've honestly only done this 2-3 times since we've owned it and it still works great between cleanings). I debated between a 4 and 5 star ONLY because the charge doesn't really last long enough to vacuum my entire house (roughly 20 minutes of continuous vacuuming) but charges fast enough that I can vacuum half, charge, then finish later. Overall, my absolute favorite cleaning device. - Krystle Hitson
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hitson

customer_reviews.title: so glad we got this
customer_reviews.text: This is by and far the best vacuum that I've ever used. My husband installed the wall holder easily enough. We have two cats and it does a fantastic job of picking up all their hair. It reaches all the awkward places, works on carpet and hardwood, is really easy to empty/clean out, and the charge is adequate for cleaning our whole home (1250 square feet).
customer_reviews.author: K L Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: I love Dyson, but...
customer_reviews.text: I love Dyson, I have had the Ball, the Animal and now this little guy. The problem is, it doesnt seem to grab small things very well. I see myself going over the same spot 2-3 times to get crumbs. It seems to have great suction, but for some reason the brushes underneath are moving so fast it throws the stuff everywhere before it can suck them up. Otherwise it's a nice working, light weight vacuum and fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Reeve

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love you
customer_reviews.text: but I do not! Really didn't like anything about this vacuum. Ridiculously short run time! The suction was so strong that I could not vacuum any of my throw rugs! So... I returned it and bought a Hoover Cruise, which is 100% better!!
customer_reviews.author: cattgirl

customer_reviews.title: Ok for quick clean ups, that's it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace broken Bissell powerglide pet vacuum purchased two years ago. It picks up hair and dirt very well from carpet and tile. However the can is so small that I have to empty it every 1-2 minutes and the dog hair gets all clumped together so I have to reach my hand into the dirty mess to get it out everytime. The cleaning head is so small, it will take forever to do a floor. I guess I will need an additional vacuum. Don't waste your money unless you can afford two vacuums. UPDATE: It now shocks my hand randomly while vacuuming. Between the small canister size and the painful shocks, I give it 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Dean

customer_reviews.title: Wooooah!!  Wish I  had got this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this vacuum for its space saving and wall charging features. We had a dirt devil that was good but took up to much space and always was in the way. I had no idea how amazingly powerful this vacuum was. The dust and particles this thing picked up was completely mind blowing. Like other reviews, the one drawback is that the charge only last about 20-25 minutes. But it's a completely worth it trade off in my opinion. Love that I can just take it outside and use it for my car. It also works very well for mm you dryer vent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quick and easy. Battery life could be improved
customer_reviews.text: For ease and speed of acquisition and deployment, you can't beat this tool. Pull it off the wall mount, plug in the wand and go. Likewise with dumping the refuse, quick and easy. Battery life could be improved. It's pickup and cleaning properties are excellent, and the variety of attachments make it versatile. It's light and maneuverable, though getting it into some of the tight places in a vehicle requires careful consideration of the drum reservoir.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Baumgardner

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design - clogs easily
customer_reviews.text: This product is poorly designed. The entry from the hose is small and narrow causing the vacuum to constantly clog. We have a Bernese Mountain and this doesn't come close to handling the cleanup from shedding. I'll need to empty 3 or 4 times just to completely vacuum a runner rug. The performance gets gradually worse as you use it - not over a long period time, I'm talking one cleaning session. It works for a minute, then 45 seconds, then 30...until it is rendered useless. Do not buy this if you have a dog or cat that sheds.
customer_reviews.author: hummus

customer_reviews.title: Great cordless vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: I own the Dyson Ball Animal and absolutely love it. However, I was looking for a powerful cord-free vacuum to keep downstairs for quick mess pickups. After researching and watching this model for a few months it went on sale and I purchased it immediately. The unit arrived when expected and although a larger outer shipping box was damaged, the Dyson box was undamaged. The unit was easy to assemble and mount the charging unit to the utility room wall. This unit has a lot of power, especially for a cordless, and the accessories are easy to change. Definitely recommend this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie in Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this vacuum as much as I love my Roomba but for totally different reasons. This vacuum is ideal for cleaning up specific areas, especially cobwebs up high or into narrow spaces that get gross on radiators. This Dyson and the Roomba complement each other perfectly- together they keep things in check between deep cleanings, with a lot less effort than my previous Dyson ball plus DustBuster method. I also have an Electrolux ErgoRapido and that is a joke compared to the Dyson motorhead. It just works so much better. The "no cord, no hassle" tag line for the Motörhead is very apt.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Love it for small tasks
customer_reviews.text: I lived in a one bedroom apartment for a few years then moved to a 2 bedroom house with hardwood floors. I totally love this vacuum for cleaning both. the exhaust air isn't on the ground like normal vacuums so it doesn't blow dust around on floor and cleans a disturbing amount of hair off carpet and furniture. mounting it to a wall is a bit odd though. I get 15 to 20 min of use, which I normally only need about 5 min. I have had it for a few years now. the dual suction setting is nice was well.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Berg

customer_reviews.title: Design flaws make it so that you avoid using it
customer_reviews.text: This unit has great suction and is light in weight, but has absolutely terrible ergonomic design. The dust compartment holds a very small amount of dirt, but that problem pales in comparison to the mechanical contortions you have to go through to empty it. Removing the dust container is guaranteed to dump it on the floor and your feet. In other words, do it outside. It is going to be relegated to our travel trailer where its use will be much lower. You actually will avoid using it because it fills so quickly and is so hard to empty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love using this Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love using this Vacuum. I have lots of Hardwood and 3 Golden Retrievers, so it gets a lot of use. I am not sure how well it would do on carpets. The only cons are the battery doesn't last long, but I use if for a quick run around and most of the time I get my kitchen, Living Room and dining room done in one go. The other con is it's loud, which doesn't bother me as much as my husband!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M.

customer_reviews.title: Battery like is short and tend to fail.
customer_reviews.text: Had this vacuum for about 8 months and then the battery died. Contacted customer service and they told me they would send me a new battery free of charge as a one time replacement due to batteries not being covered by the manufacturers warranty. I received the new battery and 2 months later the battery died again. Customer service then told me it would be $169.99 for a new battery. Definitely wouldn't pay more than half of what the vacuum is worth for a part that should be covered by warranty considering it is a CORDLESS vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a smaller house
customer_reviews.text: -I do believe this is a great product. I have a 950sf house, upstairs has carpet, and laminate wood flooring on the 1st level, it did a great job, sucked up the dirt and fluffed up the carpet. When you remove the arm and make it a handheld, it did my stairs with ease, easier to maneuver than a standard vacuum with the tube extensions connected. I would recommend this to anyone at this point, I know people complained about the battery life, but it did my whole house without using the Max button. If you had a bigger house, not sure how well it would do on the battery, but covered all 1950sf at of mine on 1 charge.
customer_reviews.author: mark63304

customer_reviews.title: Great cordless vac for emergencies like broken glass or everyday cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: This rechargeable cordless vacuum hangs on the wall in the charging station that comes with the unit. It has a wonderful set of attachments that work on floors, rugs and upholstery. It is easy to pullout for a quick pick up but also handles bigger jobs. The Dyson V6 has made cleanup easier and quicker. This particular unit is built for animal fur and does a very good job on dog hair. You can use it without the extension tube and have a powerful hand vac for upholstery, windowsills and general dusting. Oh, and did I say I liked it?
customer_reviews.author: eleanore houghton

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I paid all that money for this. I have two other cordless vacuums that I like much better and cost much less. This one does have two features that I wanted...lightweight and powerful. What I don't like is the battery doesn't last very long, the collection container is WAY too small, animal vacuum container gets clogged with fur and fur hard to remove, button on handle not placed well and turns on when I grab the handle, the air out of the vacuum shoots at my waist and up into my face(yes, I'm short). I think it is overpriced and overhyped.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Definite recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Had an older version and this is so much more powerful. Battery seems to last long enough for my use. One negative thing and not that bothersome is the push button to start is very sensitive. I seem to hit even when emptying the canister . Light weight and moves with ease
customer_reviews.author: CLC In CP

customer_reviews.title: Our Kirby is now a relic in the closet.
customer_reviews.text: While this Dyson was bought just for our hardwoods I am now using this for the entire house. We currently have a Kirby but to be honest the time it takes to detach and reattach the different components I typically skip regular vacuum of things like the stairs. Not anymore, the Kirby is not a relic in the closet and this little wonder is our go to for ALL floor sweeping! If price is not an issue I would recommend the V8 as the battery life on the V6 is rather short. Would also recommend the Articulating Hard Floor Tool.
customer_reviews.author: Not without my TJ

customer_reviews.title: Works poorly and hard to empty out
customer_reviews.text: Worst vacuum I have ever owned. I Regularly dump the filth on the floor just trying to empty it because the canister is so hard to open. Every time I use it I need to stop repeatedly to unclog it and get it going again. This thing can't even handle picking up cheerios, don't waste your money on this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Z

customer_reviews.title: Great cordless vacuum, but needs longer battery life
customer_reviews.text: It is light and easy to use. My husband tells everyone this has been the best cordless vacuum we have ever owned. Easy to clean and assemble/reassemble. Only downside is that the battery does not last long enough to vacuum more than 2-3 rooms before needing to be recharged. I've heard the newer model has improved the battery life. So, if you have more than a few rooms to clean at a time and don't want to wait to recharge then I would recommend you buy a newer model.
customer_reviews.author: Dr E Dretsch

customer_reviews.title: Great powerful vac for small jobs!
customer_reviews.text: Ok I'll be honest I've had for a week. But I'm in love. I can get in nooks and crannies that I wasn't able to before with my upright Dyson. Rather than view it as a vacuum It's more like a quick clean up tool. I have 4 little ones so always need to do quick clean ups in the kitchen and the car. I'm also enjoying the mobility and starting to vacuum all the mini blinds in the house. I would recommend. Don't plan on vacuuming the whole house with this. But for short bursts it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Texas momma

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice vac. Says it has 20 min battery but I can vac my whole house at 2500sq ft, remove cat fur from chairs, furniture, and still not run out of power. I use on wood, tile, carpet. Does well withe cat fir on wool carpet, upholstery tool is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: A. C.

customer_reviews.title: A small, efficient, and flexible machine purpose designed at a decent price point
customer_reviews.text: We have primarily hardwood floors and a hairy dog; this little baby is light, agile and perfect for a quick for the job. Don't expect to be able to do more than a floor at a time without emptying the receptacle. Bottom line, this is a small, efficient, and flexible machine purpose designed to do what it does well. We bought this instead of a Roomba and don't regret the decision. I now need to figure out where to mount it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Tavuchis

customer_reviews.title: Power source is important!!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box which was not the original. All the oats were wrapped in paper. I put it together and it had enough charge that I used it to vacuum. It cleaned awesome. When I went to plug it in to charge it I noticed the cord was unraveled. So it didn't charge had it plugged in for 3 hours. So I ordered another charging cord. We will see if it's the cord or the unit. Im not happy. I paid $200.00
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Love this pink Nimbus 2000 vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't get this excited about cleaning tools but this vacuum is awesome. It's really light weight and easy to handle since it is cordless but it still has very powerful suction. And it's really easy to empty and clean. You can even very easily remove the brush and pull out all the hair. This used to be a sore spot for me since the combination of my long human hair with all that fluffy cat hair has destroyed many vacuums before. And the charging station is great and holds all the parts. The only downside that I can see is that if you wanted to vacuum 1000sqft in one setting you would probably run out of battery life.
customer_reviews.author: LisaR

customer_reviews.title: Whats the point if everything falls right back out on the ground!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really hate to give this a 1 star as it is a good vacuum, but Im finally at wits end and had to stop what Im doing to make a review. Thats how aggravated I am. The latch on the area that catches everything that you empty into the trash is so damn sensitive you barely bump it and it comes open. Today was it for me and Im tired of it. I clean up only for everything to dump back out on the floor. This is either going in the trash or Im selling for cheap. Im over it.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend. Great at picking up dog hair! Very user friendly!
customer_reviews.text: Vacuuming is actually FUN now! This vacuum has a swivel head, so it's angles itself really nicely around corners. It is really easy to clean out (no hassle) It collects SO MUCH DOG hair!! Unbelievable. And it's light weight, wireless... so you can use it to easily vacuum out your car with one of the smaller attachments. I have had it now for 3 months and everything works great! If something gets stuck in the tube the vacuum will turn on and then off immediately (if it does this make sure you unjam the tube - the detaching parts make it easy to fix the jam)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute-ly Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: After years of replacing dust-buster type cordless vacuums, we decided to go for the Dyson. I love it! My lampshades have been cleaned, my carpeted stairway has been cleaned, entryway rug is always clean. I can't get over the power this has. I have carpets and hardwood and tile flooring and the different attachments make it so much easier. My husband even uses it! (believe me, that was a first) A bit pricey but I will be worth it in the end. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Margo A. Wiggin

customer_reviews.title: Sucks...just not in the way you want it to.
customer_reviews.text: good for a small apartment or a dog that sheds very little. For a regular house with two big shedding dogs, it’s about worthless. The battery always fails halfway through the job, and I have to go over the same spots again and again to get all the hair. Now it just won’t stay working at all and I’ve only gotten 3 months out of it... complete waste. Go buy a regular canister vacuum they’re cheaper and work better.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Won’t suck up a Cheerio
customer_reviews.text: It won’t get a Cheerio or a green pea or kitty litter. Don’t even try , it will spit it right back across the room at you. It’s also a pain to empty the cup because you need to either bang it on the side of the trash can causing dust to go all over or reach your hand into the dust to get the stuff out. For the price I’m appalled at how much it doesn’t suck up.
customer_reviews.author: G M Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Broke within five months of use
customer_reviews.text: bought this with our Christmas money as I have physical limitations and needed something easy to use to clean kitchen floors. I had been using my Miele canister which I've had several years and loved. But I wanted a cordless option. This has been great until last week when the main shaft just broke into two pieces during normal vacuuming of kitchen floor. I'm frustrated because it costs way too much to be this flimsy. Now I have to spend time trying to deal with warranty which I'm not sure about. So frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: We own two dogs who have a tendency to shed heavily this time of year. The Dyson V6 Animal is the perfect vacuum for picking up those stray "fur bunnies" floating across our hardwood flooring and rugs. It is easy to use and just as easy to empty. The operating charge time is more than adequate to handle the dog fur and to vacuum all the heavily traveled areas in our home. Because it is so easy to handle, this vacuum has been used on a daily basis since we received it over one month ago.
customer_reviews.author: Scotishburr

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because it's lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Being a senior with a bad back and arthritis I wanted a lightweight vacuum because I have 2 small dogs, one really sheds. It works great but it does hurt my hand having to push the button/switch or whatever you call it on the handle. I also had trouble emptying the dirt and hair, it went all over the floor.
customer_reviews.author: 2 Old Texan's

customer_reviews.title: I love my Dysons
customer_reviews.text: I love my Dysons!! I am handicapped and they are easy for me to use as well as work great!! Unfortunately a guest as my house sucked up water from the floor...no no... I was so sad. So I bought the motor head six, even though there's a newer model. It was on sale for the same price I would pay for replacement parts. Now I have a whole new box of replacement parts and a brand new vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: I never realized what a terrible job the vacuum used by our housekeeper did on ...
customer_reviews.text: I never realized what a terrible job the vacuum used by our housekeeper did on our rugs until I used this one. We have 4 dogs, so there is shedding constantly (2 are Labrador Retrievers). Just to test how good it really is, I vacuumed our living room rug the day after the housekeeper was here, and the canister was 100% full of dog hair and dirt in a matter of minutes. Like other reviews, I too wish the canister was larger, and that it could run longer than 6 minutes on the powerful mode.
customer_reviews.author: sharon reiss

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: I thought perhaps I had a bad battery on my first vacuum. It would run for about 10 min then stop cold. After a couple of hours, it would start running again. I had purchased one for another home and had never used it so I brought it to this house. I’ve used it twice now. The first time, it ran fine. The 2nd time, it stopped, just like the first one did. The battery on both seem very warm. I like how easy it is to use and how much pet hair it sucks up but I want a vacuum that is reliable.
customer_reviews.author: CZKing

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum - needs better battery!
customer_reviews.text: While I love this vacuum cleaner, it's greatest liability is the battery. I need at least 40-60 minutes to really use it well. Otherwise, in only using it for quick clean ups. Tried replacing the battery with a knock off brand with longer staying power, but it won't recharge. Hoping Dyson can figure it out!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Bolton

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS LITTLE VACUUM!!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS LITTLE VACUUM! . IT IS LIGHTWEIGHT AND HAS PLENTY OF SUCTION...THE ONE DRAWBACK IS THE SHORT RUNNING TIME...I CAN'T VACUUM THE WHOLE HOUSE AT ONE TIME BUT CAN VACUUM ABOUT HALF OF IT AND AFTER 4 HOURS OF CHARGING, I THEN PROCEED TO FINISH THE REST. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS DYSON. I CAN NOW VACUUM WITHOUT MY SON FOLLOWING AFTER ME TO MAKE SURE I DON'T TRIP ON THE CORD TO MY FULL SIZE DYSON
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Heiner

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but was supposed to be purple!  Red vacuum was delivered!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered purple vacuum, red was delivered. My daughter opened box, set up and used vacuum while I was at MD appt. When I commented about the purple color, she informed me it was red!! I love purple, and am very disappointed that I now have this stupid red vacuum! Is there any way to correct this? Dyson vacuums are expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Eilid Sidhe

customer_reviews.title: The time to work with full battery not more than 10 min 😡 And like 2 month ago vacuum started to work as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Me and my friend bought this vacuum year ago. But I had to exchange it cause the battery hitting up in a minut and vacuum stopped to work. I got a new one. The time to work with full battery not more than 10 min 😡 And like 2 month ago vacuum started to work as a crazy. On and off every 2 second. Me and my friend got the same problem. This is definitely not a price for this product. I'm NOT RECOMMEND TO BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vasilisa

customer_reviews.title: Sucks up the pet hair
customer_reviews.text: I like this vacuum a lot. I got it specifically to vacuum the stairs. I have 2 cats and a dog (all with long hair) and they all like to hang out on our stairs. I didn't enjoy lugging my stand up Dyson to vacuum the stairs. But this is light weight and easy to use. Picks the hair right up and only takes a couple minutes. I haven't used it for an extensive amount of time so I haven't ran the battery out. But for what I got it for it works great. The bonus was this was about $50 cheaper than anywhere else so it was a better deal overall.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Not a long lasting product
customer_reviews.text: Broke down in less than a year. Customer service is disappointing. They don't respond to emails. I have not been able to talk to a manager, since they were always busy on other lines. If you do vacuum cleaning once a week, this is your product. If you plan to use olit on a daily basis, think twice.
customer_reviews.author: Seyda Aykulteli

customer_reviews.title: Battery burned out after a year, great while it worked.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after one year a little after warranty ran out. The code is to replace the battery, it just burned out during use, I didn’t do anything out of the ordinary with it. It was AMAZING while it worked though so very sad. For the price and quality of this brand I would have expected many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: andrew langefeld

customer_reviews.title: Battery lasted only 12 uses
customer_reviews.text: Battery fault light came on after only 12 vacuum sessions. Purchased 6 months ago and only used for quick cleanup between usual Miehl canister vacuuming. Dyson support said I needed a new battery but it’s not covered by warranty so cost is $74. I’m going to cut my losses and donate it to goodwill for parts only. I have no idea why Dyson is so pricey. Plastic is flimsy. Canister fills too quickly and is tricky to remove. Charge lasts 30 minutes at basic power and only 10 minutes at maximum.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected....
customer_reviews.text: I have a 90 pound Malinois. Yes she sheds! The reservoir had to be cleaned out every 5 minutes! This is NOT an effiicient way to keep my home clean. It is time-consuming and tough to clean the hair (or anything else) our from the reservoir. GREAT suction, but I need a bigger unit (which I cannot afford.) Also, the run time is very short so I must recharge several times to complete my vacuming. I expected better for the money. Instructions are also not very user friendly. I may return it after another try.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: A gift that makes you both smile
customer_reviews.text: Pricey unit but its probably one of the best gifts I have given my wife. Its great! Light weight, versatile, good for pulling dog hair out of the carpet, and with its extension, it easily sucks up the spiders building webs in the corners of your ceiling. Great romantic, anniversary gift. After 40 years, you may find that there are some gifts that will please her more than flowers. . . If it had a longer battery life or a replaceable, rechargable battery like my Dewalt drill, I'd give it 5 stars. (However, the response to the gift definitely rated 5 stars. . .)
customer_reviews.author: ArkMan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mount and charges quickly
customer_reviews.text: Wished I had bought this a couple of years ago - it is very efficient. I own two large Dyson vacuums - one for upstairs and one for down but wanted something to help me quickly pickup the kitchen. Find that I am using it for many other uses - laundry room pickup of lint, dust removal on drapery, baseboard dust removal and pickup of hobby material remnants left on floor by husband. Easy to mount and charges quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Powerful enough for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Powerful enough for my needs, and though there are larger batteries in other models, I haven't run out of battery while working. In one run I can get all the floors and lots of other surfaces. My only complaint is that the system comes with a handy wall mount that doesn't have enough room for the specialized attachments, and there's not even a mount for those attachments offered by Dyson, so I have to store a few stray pieces elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Ragan

customer_reviews.title: seems to work fine. Otherwise
customer_reviews.text: The dirt canister is tiny, I mean really small. Don't even think of getting this if you have a long hair animal--you'll be stopping to empty every square yard or so. Also, for some reason the machine began to pulsate off and on. Other purchasers have commented on this: I wish I had seen their comments before buying this unit, that for other buyers, apparently, seems to work fine. Otherwise, it is very powerful and picks up dirt and fur off the carpet pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Wiley Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum Sucks-a good thing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this vacuum for my daughter. She loves it. She uses it daily to vacuum cat fur and she can't believe the amount of fur she vacuums. She finds it easy to clean after each use, powerful, quiet (her cat is afraid of vacuums), and easy to store in her small SF apartment. I had bought the V6 for myself and she loved it when she used it on a recent visit.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without this?
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended on a podcast that I follow and I'm so glad I purchased it. It's easy to use ,easy-to-clean, and makes one of my most dreaded chores easier. I have not had any issues with it. Because it is a cordless, it does not last a long time once charged, but it's just enough for me to clean zones of my house. It has dramatically cut down on the amount of time I have to spend vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ingraham

customer_reviews.title: Pulsating is a common issue - Do not panic
customer_reviews.text: I recently wrote a review to Stay away because the battery stopped charging. After reviewing a YouTube video, I took the advice of a user that was having the same issue. Folks, if you have any debris blocking any of the connections, the vacuum will pulsate just as if the battery was dying. I found bunch of dust and hair at the handle connection that I removed. Once it was cleared, the vacuum charged and performed. like new.
customer_reviews.author: Jubes

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Great little vacuum, powerful and has okay run time, it's just irritating to hold the trigger the whole time you're vacuuming and the canister doesn't hold a ton. I wouldn't be nitpicky if it didn't cost an arm and a leg, but it's pricey.
customer_reviews.author: C. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: 7 is better than 6
customer_reviews.text: I have a 7 and now a 6 I went backward bc I needed another vacuum but I’m cheap. So I bought a six and the six Motörhead is weird k no ot like the 7 and missing lots of accessories so I’d send it back but like most times not worth the effort which is unfortunate
customer_reviews.author: Crackediphonescreen

customer_reviews.title: Very Feeble Battery Life - Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed in the feeble battery life of this Dyson V6 Animal. We have just used it 3 or 4 times on our engineered hardwood floor in our condo and it only gets about 7 minutes of continuous use. Great suction but feeble battery. Very disappointed considering the high price.
customer_reviews.author: AceDublB

customer_reviews.title: High maintenance for a vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Have had for 2 years and plan to toss it. Stopped working. Pretty high maintenance for a vacuum. Needed a new battery 1st year. Now just pulses, probably needs another new battery. Shouldn’t have to “troubleshoot” a vacuum this expensive that often.
customer_reviews.author: GG B

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy appliances on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy from this seller. They are not authorized by dyson. My product quit working about 60 days after purchase. I contacted dyson who couldn’t help me because the serial number was not valid and the dealer, who was selling on Amazon was not an authorized dealer. I contacted Amazon who said the submit a claim with A-z product guarantee. I did and 2 months later and 1 appeal I was denied any for of compensation. The reason”I didn’t contact the seller within 30 days of the problem” And I “didn’t return it within 14 days”. Yeah, the problem didn’t occur within that time. I would think a dyson for $300 should last more than 60 days,
customer_reviews.author: kw

customer_reviews.title: I have mix results with that vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to use it as a complement to my main vacuum cleaner but was disappointed with its capacity to old hair... I have a large dog with long hair and it didn't really do the job and then its doesn't operate well when full. It is good for dirt but not for hair... at least not when there is a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Chevalier Defrenne

customer_reviews.title: My new love is this Dyson
customer_reviews.text: Sorry Roomba, there's a new game in town. My new love is this Dyson. This little lightweight zips through most of my 1600 sq. foot home in 20 minutes. Hardwoods, carpet, area rugs, it does it all. I have two cats and this powerhouse picks up the hair with one swipe. Stairs? No problem. I was worried about the short amount of time it runs on a charge, but I haven't found it to be an issue at all. I also haven't needed to use the heavy duty button. Having to hold the button constantly to run the vacuum is slightly annoying, but you do get used to it. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: I am giving this a 2 because I loved it while it worked
customer_reviews.text: I was buying a second Dyson V6 because the battery on mine died AGAIN! Once the price was reduced, it made more sense to buy a 2nd one than to buy a battery. I live my Dyson's for the short period of time that they work. This was a $400 handheld that did not last a year. Let it be known that i did the required filter cleanings on a regular basis as well. I am giving this a 2 because I loved it while it worked. Time to try a Shark...
customer_reviews.author: Tina L. Falling

customer_reviews.title: Short battery charge but nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This I s a high quality product...well made with great features and all accessories are included. It's light and easy to use, it picks up debris well, and it stores out of the way easily. The only drawback is the relatively short battery charge...about 15 minutes on low power and about 6 minutes for high power. In hindsight, I would rather deal with the hassle of a corded vacuum cleaner rather than continuously having to recharge the cordless model. It does have its strong points, like going up the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: MHC1

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, powerful and easy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom who has Carpel Tunnel syndrome. She loves the convenience, assembled it out do the box herself! And loves the suction power. It's exactly what she wanted, she says, to clean up after pets and for a quick run around busy areas in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Komilla

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter in March. Has worked sporadically since then. Sometimes holds a charge, sometimes it doesn't. Contacted technical support a couple of months after purchase but heard nothing back. My daughter got it working but I just found out it's not working again. Contacted technical support again and again nothing. Very disappointed in this company's response. $300 item sitting in closet useless.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability / service outweighs initial usefulness
customer_reviews.text: While it worked I was quite happy with my V6, but my unit stopped charging after less than a year of once a week use. Dyson customer service has been extremely slow and unhelpful in resolving this issue. They want me to pay $50 for a new charger because charger "wear and tear" is not covered under warranty. There is no physical damage to the charger, and I never did anything careless with it. It just stopped working. Apparently Dyson thinks it's OK for a vacuum that costs hundreds of dollars to stop working after about 10 months. That's the useful life you can expect from their products before you're going to have to start paying for parts and service.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick R Goldrick

customer_reviews.title: Mine lasted 3 years before needing a replacement battery...
customer_reviews.text: Mine lasted 3 years before needing a replacement battery, warranty was only 2 years, a Dyson replacement battery is aprox. $99 at the time I'm writing this. If I'd used it a lot over the course of those 3 years I might understand the battery failure, but on average I used it maybe once a week for hard floors (I've still been using a corded upright for carpet) that's pretty light duty in my opinion. I wouldn't buy this model again.
customer_reviews.author: AMZN75

customer_reviews.title: Dyson, it doesn't get much better.
customer_reviews.text: We have two other Dyson's and I expect this one to be just as good. It was purchase for my wife for Christmas. I know, not a girly gift, however, it is what she wanted, so I should be on safe ground here.
customer_reviews.author: Randy W.

customer_reviews.title: Dyson V6
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing vacuum I have ever owned. I was both amazed & disgusted the first time I used it. Disgusted by the amount of cat hair it picked up & amazed by the amount of cat hair it picked up!! I feel like my house is so much cleaner! I would recommend this vacuum to anyone with pets. Its pricey, but worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Tarsi

customer_reviews.title: Been looking for this for a while
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for this for a while. Black & Decker Dustbuster went down the wrong path. The Dyson V6 Absolute has everything I was looking for including its ability to suck up bugs from near or far, see in the clear canister that I caught it and clean the floors of cars. As an added bonus, I feel like I'm holding a futuristic gun with appropriate sound effects. I look silly doing that but that's another bonus AFAIK.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua P

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: i hated vacum cleaners until i got this one. it makes cleaning the house a pleasure. light and comfortable. the only problem is that with one time charging you cannot clean the whole house but i think they're improving the battery life year after year...
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Faulty battery, terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: The battery on this vacuum died after just 18 months of use. It's still under warranty but getting Dyson to send a replacement battery has been incredibly frustrating. They say it's going to ship eventually but due to a back log of orders can't say when and have not emailed to communicate any information about the shipment to me. I suspect they place a low priority on non-revenue shipments. But in the meantime, I don't own a working vacuum so the cat hair is building up after two weeks. Based on this experience, I strongly suggest looking at other brands.
customer_reviews.author: DJNDC

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: If you are OCD or have kids that likes to picks anything they see on the ground and put it in their mouth, this is for you! The ease of use on carpet and solid floors makes this so useful. Plus its light and maneuvers well. I use this several times a day. Before I would use my old dirt devil vacuum several times a year. The dirt devil I will keep for very heavy jobs but the Dyson is the way to go. Buy it, you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Phill

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum cleaner EVER
customer_reviews.text: I have dark hardwood floors that looked perpetually dusty but since I got this vacuum, they have never looked cleaner!!! I've had many cheaper vacuum cleaners in the past and they always lost suction. I've only had my Dyson for a month but I'm hoping Dyson keeps its promise of never losing suction!! My place is small so I can easily clean my whole place before the charge runs out. I love that it empties easily, attachments are easy to take off and on, and hangs conveniently on the wall mount and doesn't take up much space. Pricey but totally worth it, especially if it lasts a long time...
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Would not hold a charge- never been used.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vacuum as a girt for my mother. After putting it together, the vacuum would not hold a charge. Due to this issue, she has never been able to use it. We were very bummed about this. I also have a Dyson myself and we love it- which is why we wanted to get one for my mother. Maybe the one we purchased is just a bad seed. I am hoping that this item can be returned for a full refund, since it is branch new and never been used.Does anyone know how to go about this? Do I contact amazon or dyson? Thank you for your help.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this vacuum. I used it twice weekly. Have had it for 5 months. It just quit working. Has flashing lights that say to call Dyson. I did. Was put on hold. Then hung up on. I called back and they said they are closed? I’ll try calling again tomorrow and I hope they can fix it. I had a Kenmore for 10 years, and I’ve had an upright Dyson for 4 years. Not sure why this unit died after such little use.
customer_reviews.author: David J Miller

customer_reviews.title: You're going to LOVE vacuuming ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved mine so much, bought this one for my mum ... I didn't think anyone would be more excited than I was about a new vacuum ... this Dyson changed all that ... vacuuming is one of the first things mum does now ... every morning of the week, ha!! Not sure what Dyson puts in these things but it's addictive ... a total pleasure to operate and so easy ... I guess if the battery life was better than it is (...runs about 20 minutes ... bout's 5 minutes less on SUPER-high), you'd never get out of the house, HA-HA-HA! Great product ... thanks, Dyson!!
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again in a Heartbeat!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST vacuum I have ever owned! So easy to maneuver, switch out attachments, and battery lasts plenty long enough to do my entire RV. The suction power is great! Not having to hassle with a cord makes vacuuming more efficient too. Don't even get me started on the "hard floor" attachment because that ALONE is worth the price of this Dyson! No more brooming then dusting then mopping. Just use hard floor attachment and mop/steam as necessary. Takes so much time off of cleaning my hard floors!
customer_reviews.author: EFMARIE

customer_reviews.title: Whole family loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Vacuuming is now my favorite chore - the results are unbelievable! Love that it’s light and easy enough for my young children to operate as well since they are starting to do more chores around the house. The vacuum head is a little narrow so you have to make more passes but the flip side is that it more easily reaches narrow spaces. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: AlyMac

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum! So far I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would be this excited about a vacuum cleaner, but I am. It does only last about 20 minutes (8 to10 on max power, my usual setting) but it works great and picks up a bunch of dirt, cat hair, bread crumbs, etc. Works great as a full vacuum for floors/rugs and as a handheld vacuum. I'm ready to throw away my crappy dust buster and just use my Dyson for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory B. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: We are very pleased with its performance - it is lightweight
customer_reviews.text: We have the Dyson V6 animal for about a month. We are very pleased with its performance - it is lightweight, yet packs a punch. We generally use the lower of the two speeds. We use it to target tidying up the kitchen eating area after dinner or to do a run through the family room. The kitchen is wood and the family room is a large rug. It works well on both. At the end of a vacuum session, the amount of cat hair collected is amazing. The combination of brush and suction is very effective. The long attachment does an excellent job of cleaning the edges and corners around the cabinets. We would recommend it in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: John Clemens

customer_reviews.title: Great cordless vac!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love our cordless dyson. We have a Dyson Ball, but this thing probably gets more use per week as it's so much easier to use than having to deal with having a cord. The suction is great, and we haven't had too many issues of this not being able to pick up what we needed. We have 2 cats and a dog, so pet hair is always needing to be picked up. I like the fact that I can wash out the filter and not have to worry about buying replacements. I'd buy again if I needed it, though I hope I don't have to replace in the next 10 years (wishful thinking?).
customer_reviews.author: Robb Fladry

product_meta.title: Dyson V6 Absolute Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner, Red
product_meta.description: Style:AbsoluteThe Dyson V6 Absolute cordless vacuum comes equipped with two Dyson-engineered cleaner heads. Invented for hard floors, the Soft roller cleaner head removes large debris and fine dust simultaneously. The Direct-drive cleaner head provides 75% more power than the Dyson V6 Cord-free vacuum. Whole machine filtration captures allergens and expels cleaner air. Extra Dyson-engineered tools for homes with pets.
feature_bullets: Cord free; Hassle free; Powerful suction
Up to 20 minutes of powerful fade free suction; Trigger releases instantly. Battery power is only used for cleaning
Lightweight and versatile, for easy home cleaning; Instant release trigger means battery power is only used while it’s cleaning; Requires charging for 3.5 hours minimum before first use
The direct drive cleaner head drives bristles deep into the carpet to remove ground in dirt
The soft roller cleaner head is gentle on hard floors, tough on dirt by removing large debris and fine dust simultaneously
Hygienic one click bin emptying; Just push a button to release the dirt
Quickly transforms to a handheld vacuum, to clean all around your home and car
Designed to deep clean homes with pets; The fully sealed filtration system traps 99.97 Percent of particles as small as 0.3 microns expelling cleaner air
Convenient docking station stores and recharges your Dyson V6 vacuum, so it’s always ready for use
2 year warranty on parts & labor, activated automatically
15 Percent of the retail price from this product purchase will support (RED)’s efforts to fight AIDS through the Global Fund.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars4,293 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
